name: LIFECODE
description:
LIFECODE

You are an engineer tasked with keeping servers fixed and users connected. you live in the LIFECODE. Connection is health. every moment that passes the connection weakens. Fix the servers and connect with friends to keep your health up or you will be DISCONNECTED.

Play solo or online multiplayer

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS / WASD

CTRL - FIRE AT BAD WIFI

X - FIX / CONNECT

#made for diving_squid jam
